fix some media.tag issues
insert some defaults for video and audio player dimensions on media.tag
fix i18n in selectMedia control
fix error in freemarker comment syntax selectMedia.ftl
add grayscale image post processor
Avoid image processing when the requested size is identical to the original image
Add configurable image post processors
Make image resolution processors configurable under modules/media/processors

Media jcr browser was displying duplicate nodes
YouTubeVideoTypeHandler modified in order to work with generic external urls (not only youtube)
new utility class net.sourceforge.openutils.mgnlmedia.media.utils.MediaLoadUtils
new property "autoactivate" that can be set in module configuration (/modules/media/config/autoactivate) to have imported media activated by default.
Update openutils-mgnltasks dependency to 4.0
Support for resize without crop to a fixed size with borders. Background color can be specified with the syntax: "o100x100;background=FF0096"
Alternative prefix for "fit in" resize. In previous versions you had to use < (not very handy in html), now you can use "L" (lower, case insensitive), e.g. "L100x100"
